Wild mushroom risotto from Filip

Time: time
Servings: several
Source
Tags:

Ingredients

  • 1-2 Leek

500g-700g wild mushrooms, you can substitute dried 3:1

  • 2dcl-4dcl Dry shardonay wine or other white
  • Dry sherry or vermut
  • Butter or olive oil
  • 300g-400g arborio rice
  • 3/4l broth or water
  • 70g parmesan
  • salt
  • pepper

Instructions

Roast and season sliced mushrooms with olive oil or butter until browned, put aside.
Roast cut leek with butter until it smells nice. Add rice and roast until it starts going soft. Add wine and cook until steamed off. Add sherry or vermut. Take a drink to Filip.
Bring broth to boil. Add the browned mushrooms and the boiling broth. Cook until it looks like risotto. Remove from heat and mix in shredded parmesan.
